titleStmt.title: An exhortation to prayer for Jerusalems peace in a sermon preached at Dorchester at the Affizes holden there for the county of Dorset, March 19, 1662 / by Henry Glover.
titleStmt.author: Glover, Henry, b. 1624 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for William Church-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
